data.name: My Brother Rabbit - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The official soundtrack for My Brother Rabbit by Arkadiusz Reikowski, known also as the composer for Layers of Fear, Seven: Days Long Gone, Kholat, and >observer_. The soundtrack includes the piece “Dreams”, co-written and performed by Emi Evans, the voice of the Dark Souls series and Nier: Automata.
data.about_the_game: The official soundtrack for My Brother Rabbit by Arkadiusz Reikowski, known also as the composer for Layers of Fear, Seven: Days Long Gone, Kholat, and >observer_. The soundtrack includes the piece “Dreams”, co-written and performed by Emi Evans, the voice of the Dark Souls series and Nier: Automata.
data.short_description: Listen to the music that brings the game world of My Brother Rabbit to life. Immerse yourself in an unforgettable sound experience that perfectly captures the game’s mood and makes you feel like a child travelling through a world of your own imagination.
